[b:14icsywy]Quote taken from a locked thread:[/b:14icsywy]
[quote="lucy":14icsywy]Oh yes david, it's all my fault isn't it. Because I'm the one who pointlessly jumps on certain people every time they post and calls them stupid? Oh no, hang on, that's you.

From what I'm reading, [b:14icsywy]The Unknown is holding out olive branch after olive branch to you and you're just keeping your petty row going for the sake of enjoying yourself at the expense of the forum.[/b:14icsywy]
[/quote:14icsywy]

thanks. I thought no one else in the forum could see this. It's taken a large amount of self restraint to not go on a war path with him. It seems like you are the only one that recognizes my efforts. Anyway, for the record... I've taken the higher ground and I ignore any of his comments.
